messages.text: Hey, how are you doing?
I’m good, thanks! How about you?
Pretty good, just working on a project.
Nice! What kind of project?
It’s a small web app for tracking tasks.
That sounds useful. Are you building it in React?
Yeah, React with TypeScript.
Cool! Are you using Tailwind too?
Of course, Tailwind makes styling so much faster.
Agreed. I love the utility classes.
Do you use shadcn components as well?
Yes! They save so much time.
I know, right? The cards and buttons are super clean.
Exactly. And you can customize them easily.
How’s your project timeline looking?
Pretty good, I should finish by next week.
That’s awesome! Can’t wait to see it.
I’ll share the repo once it’s ready.
Perfect, looking forward to it!
Thanks, I’ll keep you posted!
